Docs.summary: Manages the camera capture, motion processing, and image analysis necessary to create a mixed-reality experience.

remarks.para: An object represents the system resources required for a mixed-reality experience. The method must be passed an T:ARKit.ARSessionConfiguration object that controls specific ebhaviors.
